## \_weakMemoizer() function

An higher order function that memoizes the results of the input function. Object arguments are stored as weak references.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _weakMemoizer<TFunction extends (...args: any[]) => any>(fn: TFunction): TFunction;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | TFunction | The function that should be memoized |

<b>Returns:</b>

TFunction

A function that memoizes the results of the input function
